titleStmt.title: The antient right of the Commons of England asserted, or, A discourse proving by records and the best historians that the Commons of England were ever an essential part of Parliament by William Petyt of the Inner-Temple, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Petyt, William, 1636-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Smith, T. Bassett, J. Wright, R. Chiswell and S. Heyrick,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
